text: Paris Jackson has ditched her dying mom to shack up with Marlon Brando ’ s granddaughter and other pals in a hideaway high in the California hills, all while her mother Hippy - Dippyhas ditched her dying mom to shack up with ’ s granddaughter and other pals in a hideaway high in the California hills, all while her mother battles breast cancer!
